FuncDef:
The ospf ldp-sync multi-area command enables LDP-OSPF synchronization on a multi-area adjacency interface.
The undo ospf ldp-sync multi-area command disables LDP-OSPF synchronization on a multi-area adjacency interface.
By default, LDP-OSPF synchronization is disabled on multi-area adjacency interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF area.
The value can be a decimal integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295 or in the format of an IP address.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
LDP-OSPF synchronization minimizes the impact of a traffic interruption that may occur on a network with primary and backup LSPs by restricting the interruption to the millisecond level.
Prerequisites
The ospf enable multi-area command has been run.
Precautions
To display synchronization information about interfaces on which LDP-OSPF synchronization is configured, run the display ospf ldp-sync interface command.
